titles.title: A bill to modify restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the Peninsula Airport Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with amendments. With written report No. 100-390.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 742.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/24/1988--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Repeals property conveyance restrictions placed upon certain property transferred to the Peninsula Airport Commission, Virginia, relating to: (1) the total acreage for which the Secretary of Transportation may grant releases; and (2) such Commission's conveyance of any property interest to persons other than the City of Newport News, Virginia.
